lifexp-bot.title: LifeXP: Gamified Journalling Chatbot
lifexp-bot.body: Designed, developed and deployed Telegram chatbot from scratch to provide a gamified and convenient journalling interface for users

2019-garden-campus.title: A Garden Campus Mobile App
2019-garden-campus.body: Developed a mobile app for the “Garden Campus” initiative to document the school’s biodiversity and guide students on a biodiversity trail around campus.

2019-open-house.title: Open House 2019 Mobile App
2019-open-house.body: Developed a mobile app as a one-stop shop to provide visitors and prospective students with information about the school’s programmes and open house schedule.

2018-ecg-fair.title: Education and Career Guidance Fair 2018 Mobile App
2018-ecg-fair.body: Led a team and developed cross-platform mobile app for students to navigate and take notes at school’s career fair, with more than 300 downloads

timetable-bot.title: Class Timetable Telegram Chatbot
timetable-bot.body: Developed and deployed Telegram chatbot to help classmates check their timetable more conveniently, which was used almost daily for more than 2 years
